videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: I am VERY impressed with this deck
videos.description:
This red / black rb rakdos sacrifice deck is very competitive in BO1 and is one of the best decks to pursue Mythic rank with on the current Standard MTG Arena ladder.

Decklist - https://moxfield.com/decks/XR7vSx2bik-X2v6ZN9qhIw

videos.author: CovertGoBlue
videos.title: Standard may have KILLED this deck
videos.description:
This Dimir Blue/Black UB Tempo deck could have been a great home for the new Aetherdrift card Oildeep Gearhulk, but the Standard BO1 Mythic Ladder metagame had other plans...
